About Us

Iberia Virtual is the best Virtual Airline to share your best experiences while flying all over the globe in your favourite aircraft!

Airbus A320

Short-Haul

Airbus A330

Long-Haul

Excellence

We strive to being excellent, and we don't plan on going below that.

Efficiency

We will get you from point A to B in no time!

Limitless Possibilities

No matter your mood, you can always find the best flight for you.

Professionalism

We actively maintain professionalism around here while still being able to have a lot of fun.

Iberia Virtual

The more you fly...

I have a feeling this Virtual Airline is going to succeed unlike any other one in the entire Infinite Flight VA world. This is how excited I am about this!

How it started

Since I got into flying, I always had a hidden love for Iberia Airlines, and that's how I decided to create a Virtual Airline that I love!

The future

The future for this VA is big, with huge plans and expectations that we can't be more excited to share!
